name: Liberty Broadband Corporation
description: Liberty Broadband Corporation is a leading telecommunications and media company based in the United States. Founded in 2014 as a spin-off of Liberty Interactive, the company primarily focuses on the provision of high-speed internet and cable services through its subsidiary, Charter Communications, which operates under the Spectrum brand. Liberty Broadband's mission is to deliver advanced communication services and enhance the customer experience through innovation and technology. In addition to its core cable services, Liberty Broadband is heavily invested in the growing areas of online video and streaming, positioning itself at the forefront of the changing media landscape. The company aims to leverage new technologies and platforms to provide superior connectivity and entertainment options to its customers. Through strategic investments and a commitment to operational excellence, Liberty Broadband is dedicated to driving growth and shareholder value in an increasingly competitive market.

seo.meta_title: Liberty Broadband Corporation | Telecommunications and Media
seo.meta_description: Explore Liberty Broadband Corporation, a leader in telecommunications and media. Discover its services, mission, and commitment to innovation.

faq.question: What services does Liberty Broadband provide?
faq.answer: Liberty Broadband provides high-speed internet and cable television services through its subsidiary, Charter Communications.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Liberty Broadband?
faq.answer: Gregory B. Maffei is the CEO of Liberty Broadband Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Liberty Broadband headquartered?
faq.answer: Liberty Broadband is headquartered in Englewood, Colorado, USA.
